# HuffmanCoding
Data compression using Huffman Coding, currently completed in JavaScript and Python. I would like to continue to grow this repository to support many languages and to be able to compress large text files and more.<br/><br/>
This message encoded with the current algorithm:<br/><br/>
<br/><br/>
Prefixes:<br/><br/>
{ l: '0000',
  f: '00010',
  d: '00011',
  i: '0010',
  u: '00110',
  y: '001110',
  D: '00111100',
  x: '00111101',
  S: '00111110',
  J: '00111111',
  w: '0100000',
  k: '01000010',
  z: '01000011',
  h: '0100010',
  C: '0100011',
  c: '01001',
  n: '0101',
  s: '0110',
  m: '01110',
  g: '01111',
  r: '1000',
  t: '1001',
  a: '1010',
  e: '1011',
  ' ': '110',
  ',': '1110000',
  '.': '1110001',
  I: '11100100',
  H: '111001010',
  v: '111001011',
  b: '1110011',
  p: '11101',
  o: '1111' }
  <br/><br/>
  Compress Testfile:<br/>
        ```
        node compressfile.js <br/>
        python compressfile.py
        ```
        <br/>
 Decompress Testfile:<br/>
      ```
      node decompressfile.js <br/>
      python decompressfile.py
      ```
